1.content: Is your original gender a man or a woman.
1.title: Lets start off with something simple

11.content:
Your phone alarm woke you up, as you shuffle in bed. You didn't want to get up this early on a Saturday, but your significant other wanted to go shopping at the mall. They would probably be at you apartment in an hour, so you got up to take a shower. You first when to take a piss, only to find something was missing. "Where the hell is my dick?" You yell out. You also noticed the two lumps on your chest, and the long brown hair you now had. "What the hell happened to me!?" you yelled out, noticing your now feminine voice. You were freaking out, when you heard your phone ring.

*note, leaving it was significant other so you can chose their gender.
11.title: Male

info.brief_description: One day, you wake up to find yourself the opposite gender. What do you do next?
info.description:
Title says it all. You wake up one day to find yourself the opposite gender. You choose what to do next, and go from there.

One rule is no changing back. Once they have swapped gender, there is no going back. Keep in mind to you are not the only one who was changed.
